name: Ajaxed Comments
author: dFactory

sections.description:
Ajaxed Comments seamlessly integrates into WordPress comments system and allows you to edit comments for a limited time, moderate and edit comments in AJAX, display error messages anywhere in the comment form and more.

For more information, check out the plugin page or see the Live demo by posting a comment on dFactory site.

Features include:

  • Editing comments inline
  • AJAX comments moderation
  • AJAX handling errors
  • Edit published comment for a limited time
  • Option to set the editing time
  • Select comment statuses available for front-end moderation
  • Option to Delete a comment permanently
  • Show edit buttons only on hover
  • Highlighting comments
  • Select highlight colors
  • Animation effects for messages and editing
  • Option to hide error message after a period of time
  • Position error messages anywhere in the comment form
  • Select CSS style for comment buttons from none, WP default or Bootstrap
  • Select CSS style for error messages
  • .pot file for translations included

Translations:

  • French – by Li-An
  • German – by Andreas Reitberger
  • Japanese – by stranger-jp
  • Polish – by Bartosz Arendt
sections.installation:
1. Install Ajaxed Comments either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Ajaxed Comments menu and set your setting for comment editing and messages.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Tweak: UI improvements for WordPress 3.8

1.0.5

  • New: German translation, thanks to Andreas Reitberger
  • New: Delete comments by logged in users or all commenters too

1.0.4

  • New: Japanese translation, thanks to stranger-jp

1.0.3

  • New: French translation, thanks to Li-An

1.0.2

  • Fix: BWS Captcha compatibility fix

1.0.1

  • Tweak: Confirmed WordPress 3.5.2 support

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Ajaxed Comments adds AJAX to WordPress comments. It enables editing comments inline, AJAX moderation, error handling and time limited comment editing.
